message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you the product for $110. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really appreciate the value it brings.
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit higher than that. Would you be willing to meet me at $95? I really think that's a fair price for the product.

I understand you're still looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I can offer you the product for $105. It's getting close to my minimum price, but I think it's still a great value for you.
